shibboleth-desc: Forni authentication usante Shibboleth in conjunction con PluggableAuth
shibboleth-wg-empty-displayname: Le variabile de configuration <var>wgShibboleth_DisplayName</var> es vacue in LocalSettings.php
shibboleth-wg-empty-email: Le variabile de configuration <var>wgShibboleth_Email</var> es vacue in LocalSettings.php
shibboleth-wg-empty-username: Le variabile de configuration <var>wgShibboleth_Username</var> es vacue in LocalSettings.php
shibboleth-wg-empty-groupmap-attr: Le variabile de configuration <var>wgShibboleth_GroupMap</var> es vacue in LocalSettings.php
shibboleth-attr-empty-username: Shibboleth: le attributo del nomine de usator non es definite
shibboleth-attr-empty-groupmap-attr: Shibboleth: impossibile trovar le attributo GroupMap
